item.description:
Join A.J. and Isabeau this week as we speak with Ed Lane owner of A New You Center for Hypnosis in Dover. Ed has been trained in various aspects of hypnosis including Weight Loss, Pain Management, Smoking Cessation and Past Life Regression. He even stands behind a lifetime guarantee for his Smoking Cessation and Weight Loss Hypnosis! Topics for this show will include how hypnosis works, the power of the mind and past lives. Also, both A.J. and Isabeau have experienced first hand the work Ed does and will be able to speak on their experiences with Ed as well. Call in to the show to ask Ed your questions!
Visit www.Blogtalkradio.com/isabeauesby to listen to this live episode or to listen to past episodes.
item.name: Intellectual Spirituality Radio Show - Featured Guest, Ed Lane, Hypnotherapist
